mapper.select: SELECT nationalityCode code,nationalityName name FROM M001NationalityMaster;
SELECT employeeNo id, employeeFirstName firstName,employeeLastName lastName FROM T001EmployeeDetai;
SELECT brokerageFeeCode id,brokerageFeeName brokerageFeeName FROM M016BrokerageFeeMaster;
SELECT customerNo id, customerLastName lastName,customerFirstName firstName FROM T002customerInfo;
SELECT managementCompanyID id, managementCompanyName firstName FROM T005ManagementCompanyInfo;
